entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:50 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: ESE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
